Color Palette:

Imagery:

Focus on visualizing the topic of the post. For AI in Business, this could involve:

A futuristic office or workspace setting, highlighting cutting-edge technologies.

Icons or symbols that represent data analysis, AI, or automation.

Visuals of humans interacting with AI systems (e.g., robots working alongside humans or using AI tools).

Abstract representations of neural networks or digital data flows.

No Text Overlay:

Do not include any text in the image, ensuring it remains clean and focuses solely on the visuals.

Text overlays or titles are not necessary in this case to keep the professional look intact.

Style and Tone:

The design should be minimalist, modern, and sleek. Use a balanced layout with a focus on professional imagery that resonates with business-minded audiences.

Font Style (if applicable):

parameters.content:
> **AI-Powered LinkedIn Post Automation**  
>  
> This workflow automates the process of creating LinkedIn posts based on user-submitted topics. It generates both **content** and a **professional image** using AI, and automatically publishes the post to LinkedIn.
>  
> - **Trigger**: Activated when a user submits a form with a topic for a LinkedIn post.
> - **AI Content Generation**: Uses Google Gemini to generate an engaging post and image prompt.
> - **Image Creation**: The prompt is sent to **[gen-imager API](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/gen-imager)** for image generation.
> - **Post Creation**: The generated text and image are posted directly to LinkedIn.
>  
> **Key Features**:  
> 1. Automated post creation for LinkedIn.  
> 2. Professional image generation with an AI-driven prompt.  
> 3. Instant publishing to your LinkedIn feed.

**On Form Submission**  
> Triggered when a user submits a topic through the form. This starts the workflow and captures the topic to generate a LinkedIn post.

> **Mapper**  
> Maps the user-submitted topic from the form and prepares it for the next step by assigning it to a variable (`chatInput`).

**AI Agent**  
> Uses the **Google Gemini** model to generate professional content for the LinkedIn post, including text and an image prompt based on the given topic.

**Normalizer**  
> Cleans and formats the AI-generated output into a readable structure for the next steps, extracting both the post text and image prompt.

> **Text to Image**  
> Sends the image prompt to the **[gen-imager API](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/gen-imager)** to generate a professional image for the LinkedIn post based on the given topic.

**Decoder**  
> Decodes the image from its base64 format into a usable binary buffer that can be uploaded to LinkedIn.

> **LinkedIn**  
> Publishes the generated LinkedIn post, including the text and the newly created image, directly to the user's LinkedIn profile.
